# Invoice System Project

## Project Overview
Full-stack invoice management system with React frontend and Node.js backend.

## Features
- Add invoice items (name, quantity, price)
- Automatic total calculations
- Discount percentage application
- Tax calculation (VAT 7.5%)
- Professional invoice display

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React + Vite
- Backend: Node.js + Express
- State Management: React hooks

## Project Structure
- `/client` - React frontend application
- `/server` - Node.js backend API
- Each has its own package.json and dependencies

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript
- Follow React best practices with functional components and hooks
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use proper error handling
- Format code consistently
